member.name: T:Bridge.Car
member.summary: Class representing a car with a license plate and bridge ticket date Inherits from the base class "Vehicle"

member.name: M:Bridge.Car.#ctor(System.String,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Car class with license plate and bridge ticket date and inherits from the vehicle base class
member.param: A string consisting of numbers and letters

member.name: M:Bridge.Car.Price
member.summary: Returns the price of a ticket as a double. Gives a % discount if boolean "Brobizz" is true.
member.returns: The total ticket price after applicable discount

member.name: M:Bridge.Car.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns vehicle type as a string

member.name: T:Bridge.MC
member.summary: Class representing a MC (Motorcycle) with a license plate and bridge ticket date Inherits from the base class "Vehicle"

member.name: M:Bridge.MC.#ctor(System.String,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MC class with license plate and bridge ticket date and inherits from the vehicle base class
member.param: A string consisting of numbers and letters

member.name: M:Bridge.MC.Price
member.summary: Returns the price of a ticket as a double. Gives a % discount if boolean "Brobizz" is true.
member.returns: The total ticket price after applicable discount

member.name: M:Bridge.MC.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns vehicle type as a string

member.name: T:Bridge.Vehicle
member.summary: Base abstract class for all vehicles

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.#ctor(System.String,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Vehicle class with a specified date
member.param: A string consisting of numbers and letters

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.Price
member.summary: Returns fixed price as a double
member.returns: A double of the vehicle price

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns vehicle type as a string
member.returns: A string of the vehicle type

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.LicensePlateLengthLimit
member.summary: Validate if license plate is longer than maximum 7 characters
member.exception: Throws an excepsion if license plate is too long
